channel.title: Unmorph

item.title: Unmorph
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

If it doesn’t work, try making a case in the action button id’s, or you could just find the case of your teles.
You can find the case of the option on your runserver when you click it.

After that make a case. it should look like this:

case: #### setSidebarInterface(#, ####);

Change it back to your inventory interface

Read full topic

item.title: Unmorph
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Hmm,

How do i get my ‘Unmorph’ interface to go away,

When i equip, the unmorph option appears, but

When i click It won’t go away,

I added [code]case 23132: //unmorph
EntangleDelay = 0;
setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
if(ancients == 0)
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
if(ancients == 1)
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}

	setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
	setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); 
	setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
	setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
	setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
	setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
	setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

RemoveAllWindows();
isNpc = false;
remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
[/code]

Case, Still didn’t work, Any ideas?

Read full topic
